ygData.subject: Vacation (kinda)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, tomorrow I m leaving for Defcon, a hacker conference in Las Vegas that s gonna last the whole weekend. I really doubt I ll have time to post, though I

Well, tomorrow I'm leaving for Defcon, a hacker conference in Las Vegas that's gonna last the whole weekend. I really doubt I'll have time to post, though I will have internet access so I might drop in for a little while. I've been preparing my laptop for a hacker war, wish me luck :-)





Anyways, I'll split my chars among people a bit. Here's who gets who until Monday (if its ok with them to control those bots till then).





Robo - Cledar, Rixer, Forrior, Blyer, Firearm (have them go to the battle to help the Chivtrons. Here's your chance to make HotRod look competent for a change) :-)





Hedge - DevilDuer (don't make him act _too_ stupid).





Gunthers - Dion





Megan - Prowl, Cyndro.








That'll go into effect tomorrow. I'm not sure if I can post today, but I'll try.
